# Feature Selection: SelectFromModel (RandomForest)

```{r}
library(daltoolbox)
library(daltoolboxdp)

rf    <- create_fe_rf_model(df, "Class", n_estimators = 50)
sf    <- create_fe_selectfrommodel_rf(rf, threshold = "mean", prefit = TRUE)
X_sel <- fit_transform_fe_selectfrommodel_rf(sf, df, "Class")

dim(X_sel)
```
